traits.name: Archer
entries: A longbow or shortbow deals one extra die of its damage when Falcon hits with it (included in his longbow attack).

traits.name: Sharpshooter
entries: Falcon's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Falcon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
